5.review_notes:
Post-Incident Review - INC0000023

Attendees: Incident Manager, Technical Leads, Account Manager, 8 team members
Duration: 49 minutes

Timeline Review:
- Detection: 2025-09-11T12:19
- Acknowledged: 2025-09-12T21:33
- Resolved: 2025-09-22T06:38
- Total Duration: 22 hours

Key Discussion Points:
1. Initial response effectiveness
2. Communication clarity during incident
3. Escalation procedures followed
4. Technical resolution approach
5. Customer impact mitigation

Team Performance: Good response time
5.lessons_learned:
• Post-incident procedures followed as documented. Recovery time met expectations for P2 severity.
• Early detection systems proved effective. Monitoring alerts identified the issue within 19 minutes.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 59 minutes to stakeholders.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 59 minutes to stakeholders.
5.action_items:
1. Review and update escalation thresholds for P2 incidents - Assigned to: Incident Manager - Due: 11 days
2. Schedule vendor review meeting to discuss escalation procedures - Assigned to: Vendor Manager - Due: 14 days
3. Implement additional monitoring for disk space - Assigned to: DevOps - Due: 26 days
4. Enhance customer communication templates for P2 severity - Assigned to: Account Management - Due: 26 days
5. Conduct training session on communication templates - Assigned to: Training Team - Due: 57 days
6. Conduct training session on communication templates - Assigned to: Training Team - Due: 57 days

7.review_notes:
Post-Incident Review - INC0000031

Attendees: Incident Manager, Technical Leads, Account Manager, 5 team members
Duration: 48 minutes

Timeline Review:
- Detection: 2025-09-15T19:23
- Acknowledged: 2025-09-16T00:47
- Resolved: 2025-09-16T08:09
- Total Duration: 41 hours

Key Discussion Points:
1. Initial response effectiveness
2. Communication clarity during incident
3. Escalation procedures followed
4. Technical resolution approach
5. Customer impact mitigation

Team Performance: Excellent coordination
7.lessons_learned:
• Early detection systems proved effective. User reports identified the issue within 6 minutes.
• Documentation was incomplete. Implement structured templates.
• Root cause analysis completed within SLA. Log analysis identified the underlying issue.
• Escalation to executive level could have been faster. Consider lowering escalation thresholds for P2 incidents.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 22 minutes to stakeholders.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 22 minutes to stakeholders.
7.action_items:
1. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 67 days
2. Review and update escalation thresholds for P2 incidents - Assigned to: Incident Manager - Due: 9 days
3. Implement automated backup verification - Assigned to: Engineering - Due: 60 days
4. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 67 days
5. Implement automated backup verification - Assigned to: Engineering - Due: 60 days
